item.title: Analysis of Fatal COVID-19 Cases in Toronto
item.description: By: Arjun Dhatt Abstract In this analysis, I will be looking at COVID-19 data in the city of Toronto to identify unique trends in the fatal cases of COVID-19. After conducting the analysis, I was able to conclude that COVID-19 is more fatal to the older population compared to the younger population. This information is crucial because it helps determine who is most at risk from the virus. Introduction The COVID-19 pandemic has affected the entire world in many different ways.
